fields.label: General Placement

fields.message: General Information for a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Clinical Resources

fields.label: General Title of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Clinical Resources
fields.name: clinical_resource_fpage_title_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title of a fake subpage (or section) for clinical resources in an area of expertise subsection [or profile]).

fields.instructions:

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., intro text of a fake subpage (or section) for clinical resources in an area of expertise subsection [or profile]).

fields.label: General Featured Image of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Clinical Resources
fields.name: clinical_resource_fpage_featured_image_general
fields.instructions:
Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.

fields.message: General Reference to the Main Clinical Resource Archive

fields.label: General Title of a Reference to the Main Clinical Resource Archive
fields.name: clinical_resource_fpage_ref_main_title_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages for clinical resources contain references linking users back to the main clinical resource archive. This sets the title used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title in a reference to the main clinical resource archive on a fake subpage for clinical resources in an area of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Body Text of a Reference to the Main Clinical Resource Archive
fields.name: clinical_resource_fpage_ref_main_intro_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages for clinical resources contain references linking users back to the main clinical resource archive. This sets the body text used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default body text structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., body text in a reference to the main clinical resource archive on a fake subpage for clinical resources in an area of expertise subsection).
fields.placeholder: Access a wealth of [clinical resources], including articles, videos, infographics, and documents, covering various specialties within UAMS Health. Expand your knowledge and stay informed.

fields.label: General Link Text of a Reference to the Main Clinical Resource Archive
fields.name: clinical_resource_fpage_ref_main_link_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages for clinical resources contain references linking users back to the main clinical resource archive. This sets the link text used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default link text structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., link text in a reference to the main clinical resource archive on a fake subpage for clinical resources in an area of expertise subsection).

fields.message: General Reference to a Top-Level Ontology Item's Fake Subpage for Clinical Resources

fields.label: General Title of a Reference to a Top-Level Ontology Item's Fake Subpage for Clinical Resources
fields.name: clinical_resource_fpage_ref_top_title_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages under nested ontology items contain references linking users back to the same type of fake subpage under the top-level ancestor ontology item (e.g., from "Bone Cancer Care clinical resources" to "Cancer Care clinical resources"). This sets the title used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used.

fields.placeholder: Access a wealth of [clinical resources], including articles, videos, infographics, and documents, covering various specialties within UAMS Health. Expand your knowledge and stay informed.

fields.message: Reference to a Top-Level Location's Fake Subpage for Clinical Resources

fields.label: Title of a Reference to a Top-Level Location's Fake Subpage for Clinical Resources
fields.name: clinical_resource_fpage_ref_top_title_location
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages for clinical resources under descendant locations contain references linking users back to the same type of fake subpage under the top-level ancestor location (e.g., from "Clinical Resources Related to the Specialty Clinic" to "Clinical Resources Related to the Orthopaedic and Spine Hospital"). This sets the title used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the general placement title structure will be used.
